author: @trench6118
text: Any potential to review existing code? My challenge is that I googled for alternatives to Excel and found pandas. Fast forward a year later and I have pandas/python doing a lot of my work for me but mainly because I am like.. 'how do I do this in pandas' and then modify someone's solution. I am just now going back and trying to make my code more error-resistant, add defs, schedule programs to run, etc. It would be nice to have someone review my code and understand what I am trying to do and help point me towards a better way or explain concepts etc.

author: @MrIkariaman
text: First of all, I am a pleb, in other words, not going to pay/subscribe, but I think that doing something like that is amazing and I would like to wish you good luck on in. Another thing that may encourage people to become subscribers would be releasing some videos earlier for them (just like patreon, but hosted in your own site perhaps?), having a subscriber only lounge(something like a mini-forum) where you interact with subscribers. These are just some ideas from the top of my head but I'm sure you can check other people who use youtube as their main source of income for monetization tips.
